test_suite.name: Test Suite 1 - Trello Label and Checklist Management
test_suite.description: Comprehensive test suite for Trello board functionality including label management, checklist operations, and checklist item handling

test_cases.name: TC_LOGIN
test_cases.description: Base login functionality using Google OAuth authentication

parameters.object: Object Repository/Page_Ghi li, sp xp v gii quyt vic cn lm t b_870fc3/a_ng nhp
Object Repository/Page_Log in to continue - Log in with Atlas_6762ee/button_Google

steps.description: Click Next button using JavaScript executor

elements.object: Object Repository/Page_Sign in - Google Accounts/div_Forgot email_VfPpkd-RLmnJb

steps.description: Click Sign In button using JavaScript executor

test_cases.expected_result: User successfully logged into Trello dashboard

test_cases.name: TC_LABEL_ADD_01
test_cases.description: Verify label creation with custom title and color selection
preconditions: Test board exists and is accessible

steps.description: Wait for page to load completely
Click Create a new label button

parameters.object: Object Repository/Page_Software Testing  Trello/button_Create a new label
Object Repository/Page_Software Testing  Trello/button_Select a color_Sky

steps.description: Verify label exists with correct color and title

test_cases.expected_result: Label 'Nhắc Nhở' created successfully with Sky color attribute

test_cases.name: TC_LABEL_ADD_02
test_cases.description: Verify label creation without title (empty title field)
preconditions: Test board exists and is accessible

steps.description: Click Create a new label button

parameters.object: Object Repository/Page_Software Testing  Trello/button_Create a new label
Object Repository/Page_Software Testing  Trello/button_Select a color_Sky

test_cases.expected_result: Label created successfully with aria-label showing 'Color: sky, title: none'

test_cases.name: TC_LABEL_EDIT_01
test_cases.description: Verify label title and color can be modified

parameters.object: Object Repository/Page_Software Testing  Trello/button_Select a color_red

test_cases.expected_result: Label displays with Red color and title 'Cập Nhật'
test_cases.verification_method: XPath verification for color and aria-label attributes

test_cases.name: TC_LABEL_EDIT_02
test_cases.description: Verify system behavior when creating duplicate label names with different colors
preconditions: Label 'Nhắc Nhở' with Sky color already exists

steps.description: Verify edited label with Red color exists
Verify existing label with Sky color still exists

test_cases.expected_result: System allows duplicate label names with different colors - both Red and Sky 'Nhắc Nhở' labels exist
test_cases.verification_method: Dual XPath verification for both label instances

test_cases.description: Verify checklist creation without custom name (default name)

steps.description: Verify checklist created with default name

test_cases.name: TC_CHECKLIST_EDIT_01
test_cases.description: Verify checklist name can be successfully modified
preconditions: Card with existing checklist is available

steps.description: Wait for checklist title to be clickable
Wait for edit mode to activate
Wait for edit input field to appear
Enter new checklist name and press Enter
Wait for updated title to display

test_cases.expected_result: Checklist title updated to 'Danh Mục Cập Nhật'

test_cases.name: TC_CHECKLIST_EDIT_02
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents empty checklist names and retains original name
preconditions: Card with existing checklist is available

steps.description: Wait for checklist title to be clickable
Wait for checklist title to be visible
Clear field and press Enter (empty name)
Retrieve checklist name after empty save attempt

parameters.comment: Tên checklist sau khi cập nhật rỗng:

parameters.true_message: ✅ Checklist tên rỗng không được chấp nhận, giữ nguyên tên cũ.

false_conditions.message: ❌ Checklist tên rỗng được chấp nhận (không mong muốn).

test_cases.expected_result: Checklist retains original name; empty name rejected

timing_considerations.action_delays: 1-3 seconds for UI updates and state changes

failure_handling.login_dependency: STOP_ON_FAILURE - All tests depend on successful login
failure_handling.optional_verifications: OPTIONAL - Used for conditional element checks

browser_management.cleanup: All test cases close browser in final step
